infoData.belowcontact: Aside from designing product experiences, I love canoeing, cats, and cycling.
infoData.cta: If you’re interested in working with me or just want to chat, feel free to contact me!
infoData.description:
I’m glad you’re here.

I’m a designer based in New York with an expertise in information architecture and interaction design. My goal is to create products and experiences that I’m proud of while having a positive and meaningful impact on the people I work with and design for.

I'm currently designing for wealth management customers at JP Morgan Chase.
